trans-unit.source: Verifies an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> PKCS #1 version 1.5 signature.
trans-unit.target: Verifica uma assinatura <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> PKCS nº 1 versão 1.5.

trans-unit.source: This class is used to verify a digital signature made with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe é usada para verificar uma assinatura digital feita com o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> algoritmo.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter> to create digital signatures with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter> para criar assinaturas digitais com o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> algoritmo.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A> method to verify a signature.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A> método para verificar uma assinatura.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter" />.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.SetKey%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.SetHashAlgorithm%2A> to set the key and hash algorithm before calling <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.SetKey%2A> e <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.SetHashAlgorithm%2A> para definir o algoritmo de hash e a chave antes de chamar <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The instance of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> that holds the public key.
trans-unit.target: A instância de <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> que retém a chave pública.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter" /> class with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter" /> com a chave especificada.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.SetHashAlgorithm%2A> to set the hash algorithm before calling <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.SetHashAlgorithm%2A> para definir o algoritmo de hash antes de chamar <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="key" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="key" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the hash algorithm to use for verifying the signature.
trans-unit.target: O nome do algoritmo de hash a ser usado para verificar a assinatura.

trans-unit.source: Sets the hash algorithm to use for verifying the signature.
trans-unit.target: Define o algoritmo de hash a ser usado para verificar a assinatura.

trans-unit.source: You must set a hash algorithm before calling <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Você deve definir um algoritmo de hash antes de chamar <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The instance of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> that holds the public key.
trans-unit.target: A instância de <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> que retém a chave pública.

trans-unit.source: Sets the public key to use for verifying the signature.
trans-unit.target: Define a chave pública a ser usada para verificar a assinatura.

trans-unit.source: You must set a key before calling <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Você deve definir uma chave antes de chamar <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="key" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="key" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The data signed with <c>rgbSignature</c>.
trans-unit.target: Os dados assinados com <c>rgbSignature</c>.

trans-unit.source: The signature to be verified for <c>rgbHash</c>.
trans-unit.target: A assinatura a ser verificada para <c>rgbHash</c>.

trans-unit.source: Verifies the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> PKCS#1 signature for the specified data.
trans-unit.target: Verifica a assinatura PKCS nº 1 do <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> para os dados especificados.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="rgbSignature" /> matches the signature computed using the specified hash algorithm and key on <paramref name="rgbHash" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="rgbSignature" /> corresponder à assinatura computada usando a chave e o algoritmo de hash especificados em <paramref name="rgbHash" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: You must specify a key and a hash algorithm before calling this method.
trans-unit.target: Você deve especificar uma chave e um algoritmo de hash antes de chamar esse método.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A> method to verify a signature.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A> método para verificar uma assinatura.

trans-unit.source: The key is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: A chave é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The hash algorithm is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O algoritmo hash é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="rgbHash" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="rgbHash" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="rgbSignature" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="rgbSignature" /> é <see langword="null" />.
